text: Now when news of this reached all the kings west of the Jordan—those in the hill country, the foothills,9:1 Hebrew Shephelah or lowlands; that is, the western foothills of Judea and all along the coast of the Great Sea 9:1 That is, the Mediterranean Sea toward Lebanon (the Hittites, Amorites, Canaanites, Perizzites, Hivites, and Jebusites)—
